components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures on Telkom Network in Kenya

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing MMS/SMS delivery failures Telkom network in Kenya . Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Altice Network in Dominican Republic

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Altice network in Dominican Republic. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Latin America

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in MMS/SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Altice network in Dominican Republic. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Arab Emirates SMS Carrier Maintenance - Etisalat

incident_updates.body: The Etisalat network in United Arab Emirates is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 February 2023 at 12:00 PST until 02 February 2023 at 18:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Etisalat United Arab Emirates handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our Carrier Partner Everything Everywhere EE UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 February 2023 at 14:00 PST until 02 February 2023 at 22:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for EE UK customers.

Impacted Products : Silent Network Authentication (SNA), Lookup SIM Swap, Identity Match

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 01 February 2023 at 12:00 PST until 27 February 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

01 February 2023 at 12:00 PST until 01 February 2023 at 16:00 PST
06 February 2023 at 12:00 PST until 06 February 2023 at 16:00 PST
08 February 2023 at 12:00 PST until 08 February 2023 at 16:00 PST
13 February 2023 at 12:00 PST until 13 February 2023 at 16:00 PST
15 February 2023 at 12:00 PST until 15 February 2023 at 16:00 PST
20 February 2023 at 12:00 PST until 20 February 2023 at 16:00 PST
22 February 2023 at 12:00 PST until 22 February 2023 at 16:00 PST
27 February 2023 at 12:00 PST until 27 February 2023 at 16:00 PST
